intro: It is an incredible family trip on a motorhome across the USA.
description:
Go on a journey through the amazing places across the USA.  
Visit interesting and amazing places such as national parks, ski resorts and canyons, play exciting mini-games, collect souvenirs and find all the objects.

This hidden object game is full of beautiful and interesting places. 
Use your skills and knowledge to play mini-games and find all the hidden objects.

The collector's edition includes:
- 10 additional locations: find even more objects and a funny raccoon!
- 8 additional new mini-games + 12 more for puzzle lovers
- 20 great souvenirs from the trip
